section.title: Replication
section.para: 很多教程上面采用手工配置主从复制，我不建议你这样启动，请采用修改/etc/mongod.conf配置文件的方案。
section.screen:
创建主：
mongod –port 27017 –dbpath /var/lib/mongodb –master
创建从：
mongod –port 27017 –dbpath /var/lib/mongodb –slave –source master_ip_address:27017

section.title: Master
section.screen:
sed -i "s/#master = true/master = true/" /etc/mongod.conf
systemctl restart mongod

section.title: Slave
section.screen:
sed -i "s/#slave = true/slave = true/" /etc/mongod.conf sed -i "s/#source = arg/source = mongodb.master.example.com/" /etc/mongod.conf
systemctl restart mongod
